message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering the exceptional quality and the unique features of this product, I propose an offer of $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive value it brings to you. I understand that this might be a significant investment, but I am confident that it will provide substantial returns on your investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.
